name: Under Pressure (Wabitus)
description:
They work too hard. They have a meeting. It can go really bad. Please keep it going as long as you can.

How to play

Use your mouse to:
- Click on a Business Man and move to aim the colleagues.
- Release to shout at the colleagues.

Just keep trying to aim the calmest ones and share the hate as much as you can.

A game by:
Benjamin Vurlod - Arts
Stéphane Restani - Code
Sandro Dall'Aglio - Game Design
